title: Apple brings Force Touch to desktops, alongside new Magic Keyboard and Mouse
text:
Apple brings Force Touch to desktops, alongside new Magic Keyboard and Mouse 
Published By: Pocket-lint.com - Today 
Apple has announced a new Magic Keyboard, Magic Mouse 2, and Magic Trackpad 2 for iMac and desktop users. The new wireless Mac accessories...
